Who is going to grow?

Yoh Asakura
Yoh is the hero of the series and a powerful shaman. He is laid back and prefers to let things happen rather than do anything. However he always will help someone in need and when active is a powerful opponent to any wrong-doer.

Trey
Trey is the Ice Shaman and loved food. He is lazy and has spikey blue hair.

Len
The uptight rich boy who joined Yoh on his own quest to be King of the Shaman.
Please Note: In the english version he is known as Len or Lenny, the Japansese version knows him as "Ren" or "Tao Ren". This story is about the english anime, so please call him "Len" and not "Ren" to prevent confusion.

Zeke
The evil guy of the series, and the identical twin of Yoh. They both are the reincarnation of Zeke Asakura, the original shaman who gained ultimate power when he mastered the five elements. He was reborn as twins, though only one remained evil and carried the original Zeke's power.

Other

Oh the entire world's military can't save the planet, but that kid can.

115.content:
Having spent an extended period of time sleeping in the park, Yoh was understandable groggy. It didn't help matters that it was rather hot outside and Yoh's eyes were sensitive to the bright light.

"That's one of the worst things about falling asleep in the middle of the day." He muttered to himself. "When you wake up you feel sick, you can't sleep that night, the lights are too bright and people are too loud."

Yoh thought about going home but quickly scrapped that plan when he thought of Anna. As soon as he stepped foot inside that house he knew he'd be attackled and forced to do "training" which lately had devolved into doing chores while Anna watched. Sometimes Yoh wanted to just throw a rag into her face and tell her to do her own work, but he didn't dare. Plus he was a pretty easygoing guy. Then again, maybe there was something wrong with the picture when someone as nice and care free as him has thoughts of yelling and starting an unnecessary fight. So with all those thoughts passing through his mind, he turned away from the direction his house was in and walked aimlessly down the street. Now that he was starting to feel more awake, the sun wasn't quite so bright and intruding. In fact, it was quite pleasant on his bare torso. Or what was bare between his open shirt.

Little did he know, his body was slowly restructuring itself, increasing bone and muscle size, forcing his body to begin a growth spurt of unbelievable proportions. The bug that had bitten him was a rare breed of insect that caused swelling in the parts of the body that were bit. But this insect had been specifically breeded to have a proportionate effect over the entire body no matter where a person was bit. Also, the power of the swelling had increased dramatically to the point that if Yoh didn't get out the city within the next couple of hours, his toe alone would probably be enough to crush the city flat.

So the fate of all the people in Yoh's hometown rested on whether or not Yoh left within the next few hours. Would they survive?

Trey was busy meditating alone in the forest. He wanted to gain as much power as possible to crush the competition and become the Shaman King.

Sitting there alone he dozed off...



What direction should we go in?
12.title: Trey

122.content:
As Trey dozed off, his subconcious began to go over him. His meditative state had allowed his power to free itself. His inner power sensed what Trey wanted. Strength, power, size, and secretly his own collection of tiny men who worshipped him. Though it already knew of his dream of fields for his tiny spirit's kind.

The power wanted to grant his wish. And so it called forth some of the power of the Great Spirit. And almost on instinct the Great Spirit offered a small, microscopic piece of its power. Yet this small piece of power would change Trey in ways no one would imagine. His body began to grow in size. His clothes stretching and tearing as it ripped apart, soon his body pressed against the trees and ripped them from the ground.

And Trey simply slept not realizing he was growing to a astounding size. Soon he was...
122.title: Trey searches for his inner power.

1222.content:
Trey slept on, not realizing the amount of power he now posessed, nor that he was bigger than the clearing he had fallen asleep in. The Great Spirit had granted him his wish of power and his body had stopped changing for now.

Soon enough, Trey woke from his slumber and stretched as he sat up. He hadn't meant to fall asleep while he was meditating. That was something that Yoh usually did. He looked around, confused. He scratched his head as he appeared to be among extremely coarse, tall grass. He looked down at himself and was shocked to see he was naked! He tried to cover himself up, but realized he was in a forest and therefore was unlikely to be spotted. He relaxed a little and stood up, looking around. It was dark out and he couldn't see much, except for the strange grass that grew for miles around.

He looked down and saw some of the grass had been uprooted and was laying on the ground. He picked it up and brought it close to his face. It felt quite a bit heavier than a blade of grass should, oddly enough. He examined and was shocked to see that it appeared to be a tree. He looked more closely at the surrounding "grass" and came to the same conclusion. It was all trees. He was still in the forest. Looking down on the ground Trey also saw some scraps of cloth. All that remained of his clothes.

Somehow, in the night, he had grown into a giant. Judging by the size of the trees compared to him, he approximated himself at about 120 ft. tall, give or take a foot. He thought about how small normal people would be to him and grinned. This was an opportunity that didn't come around for just anyone. He was going to make the most of it!
1222.title: New Power, New Plans

choices: Yoh Starts To Grow Too (Due to touching Trey)
12221.content:
Trey grinned as he started to make his way out of the 'forest' his gargantuan feet making huge imprints in the ground. After only a few seconds he had found the city, his shadow covered most of the area. People abruptly stopped their vehicles and stared up at the large Trey. They couldn't see his face due to the large boner he had. He stood there, completely naked, imaging the many ways which he could wipe this insignificant city out of existance. He crouched down so his face loomed directly over the city, he heard several people gasp. Looking around he finally spotted Yoh's house, reaching for it he ripped it from the ground with no effort at all. (He had pulled the floor of the house up too) He stood back up and lifted the house up to his face.

"Yoh! Hey Yoh come out! I got something to show you!"

After a short wait the door slowly opened and out stepped Yoh, clad only in a pair of boxer shorts and rubbing his eyes. "Yeah? Trey whats going on?" he asked sleepily.

"Look up!"

Yoh looked up, he was still sleepy so his vision was a bit blurred. But soon his vision cleared and he saw what appeared to be Trey's giant face smiling down at him.

"T-Trey!?"

"Heheh, yep! I woke up like this! Cool huh?" Trey said scratching his head.

"B-But how...I mean....this is impossible." Yoh said falling down on his butt.

"Who cares how it happened? The point is I can do anything now! So lets have some fun already!" Trey said, and without waiting for an answer he placed Yoh up on his blue haired head, dropped Yoh's house, and turned his attention back to the city.
12221.title: Trey's Surprise

122212.content:
Suddenly Yoh started growing,due to touching trey, "Trey look at me im growing", "Awesome Yoh" said Trey. Yoh rapidly expanded up to treys height. "This is so awesome" said yoh. "Fuck yeah, what do you want to do now?"

Yoh responded
122212.title: Yoh Starts To Grow Too (Due to touching Trey)

12222.content:
Suddenly he began to grow again! He grew and grew, until he reached 130 ft.! His feet stretched on for miles! Grinning he went off to find the nearest city, so he could have some fun.

(In the city)

The people of the city were going about their daily business, until it suddenly became dark that is! They looked up to see what had caused the sudden darkness and were surprised to see a giant naked blue haired boy blocking out the sunlight with his massive form! Trey stretched and planted one of his feet on top of the busy city. Not caring about how many lives had ended because of this simple action, he crouched down to get a better look at the panicking people.
12222.title: Even Bigger!

choices: Wakes up only a little bigger (Slow unbelievable growth)
125.content: As Trey fell asleep his concious shut down and his subconcious continued to meditate and work. While his body rested, his mind and soul continued to draw in spiritual power increasing his furyoku immensely. The longer he slept the more time his mind and soul had to draw in more and more power. Though he was unaware of it, Trey was slowly becoming more and more powerful surpassing his friends in strength one by one. Finally, he suddenly woke up. He felt a strange charge running through his body. It was powerful. He'd never felt so much power! This couldn't be normal. Trey stood up feeling woozy. He could feel his body burning, changing to accomadate the vast amounts of power he'd gained. He fainted as his body changed.
125.title: Too Much To Handle?

1251.content:
Yoh was running through the forest, training again for Anna. Suddenly he turned a corner and crashed into something.

Sitting up he looked at what he had crashed into.

"Woah..." Yoh exclaimed, speechless.

It was a giant foot. A bare foot lying on its side, with its little toe on the ground, and the big toe in the air. But this foot wasn't just gigantic, it was horrendously huge. It was so long that Yoh couldn't see where it ended by the heel, it vanished into the forest as the trees obstructed his view. The little toe alone was about as much as Yoh could see. The rest of the foot just stretched into the distance.

Yoh walked up to the little toe and measured himself against it. Counting in his head, he worked out how long the little toe was.

Yoh felt weak. The toe he was looking at he estimated to be around 250 feet long. That would mean the entire foot was over 3000 feet long, making the giant over 20,000 feet tall.

"If I was that tall, a normal person would be around... less than 1/32 inch tall!" Yoh thought to himself.

He started to freak out, and fainted leaning against the sweaty sole of the gigantic foot.
1251.title: Calculations

choices: Yoh makes it past the next toe
12512.content:
A thought suddenly popped into Yoh's head. If this freakishly massive giant stood up, or even moved, he could be crushed like a flea! Since he couldn't see where the foot ended lengthwise he concluded his best bet would be to try and climb the foot to the top. Stretching his head back as far as he could he still couldn't see the top of the toes. He could barely see past the little toe! He rubbed his hands together and started climbing. Since the giant was so big the folds of his skin were like handholds.

A few hours later and Yoh had made barely any progress. He stopped between the pinky toe and the next toe to take a breather. He was starting to think this was a bad idea. But he could't stop now. With his rest over and began to climb again.

As all this went on, Trey continued to sleep. He was exhausted after having such a massive amount of power flood into him and he was blissfully unaware of his best friend, now a flea in comparison, climb his massive foot.
12512.title: Better Up Than Down

choices: Yoh starts to climb the big toe
125121.content:
While Yoh continued climbing, he hoped and prayed that the giant wouldn't wake until he was safe. If the giant woke up now, all he would have to do is twitch his toes and Yoh would be sent flying the hundreds of feet to the ground. Even if he survived it, he would surely be crushed as the giant stood up, as his feet would cover an area far larger than the one Yoh was in.

As he was thinking this, he finally made it to the next toe. It was getting harder, as he had found after the little toe, he had to climb the actual sole of the foot and not the sole of the toe, as there was no way he could reach the next toe from the little one. So Yoh had walked along the tiny toe to the sole of the sweaty foot and climbed.

Each time he reached a toe, Yoh left the sole and walked along the toe towards the end to see how far he had to go. Since the foot was on its side, Yoh could walk along the toe between it and the one above.

Hours later, Yoh was reaching the second to last toe. Above him was the hardest toe of all, the big toe. A toe that could crush many houses in one go.
125121.title: Progress

choices: Yoh makes it onto the foot
Trey starts walking, trying to figure out where he is
1251212.content:
Just as Yoh was about to start climbing up the big toe, the whole foot started shaking and rumbling. Without warning the foot suddenly started tilting! The giant was rolling over from his side to his back! Thinking fast, Yoh ran along the toe as it turned. Unfortunately it was far too big for him to make it over and get ontop of the toe. He managed to cling to the inside of the toe, using the folds of the toe has hand holds. He held on as tight as he could while he waited for the giant to stop moving.

Trey yawned and rubbed his eyes, wondering what time it was. He knew he'd been meditating but he didn't know for how long. He sat up and looked around. He blinked as he realized he wasn't in the forest anymore.

"Did I sleep walk?" He asked himself confused.

He shrugged and stood up, looking around. He wondered which way he should go to see where he was.

While Trey decided, Yoh had already started climbing again. He was climbing faster than he had ever climbed before. He needed to make the most of this time before the giant moved again. The safest place for now was ontop of the foot. At least he wouldn't be crushed there.
1251212.title: Slumbering Titan Awakens

choices: Trey doesn't know where he is
12512121.content:
Yoh manages to pull his body to the top of the toe as it moved about. He collapsed on top of the massive digit, further down from the nail so he was standing on skin. Lying there he just tried to catch his breath from the immense climb.

Meanwhile Trey was just standing there, his large 3000 ft long feet covering the forest. He looked around, but he couldn't see anything that looked like the camp. He had absolutely no idea where he was. He had no idea he was crushing the forest below him, it just felt like a mossy ground.

Leaning over he clutched his stomach. In the blink of an eye Trey had just doubled in size. His feet spread out and covered the entire forest. His big toe was now over 1290 ft long.

Trey started to walk...
12512121.title: Woah

125121212.content:
Yoh felt a tremendous lurch that threw him to the ground. He quickly clung onto the folds of skin in the toe and held on tight. Every step that Trey took covered several miles. The mere motion of the rising foot pressed Yoh against the toe with tremendous pressure. Then, as the foot was brought back to the ground, Yoh had to hold on tight or he would fly up into the air. Once the foot hit the ground Yoh was slammed against the foot only to start the entire process over again.

As Yoh was being pumelled, Trey stopped walking for a moment, scratching his head. The terrain was so unfamiliar it was like he was on an alien planet. Speckled over the landscape was the odd patch of moss, a trickle of water from a rainstorm, a hill of dirt. He wondered how far he was from civilization not realizing he had accidently stepped on several villages just from walking. He decided to pick a new direction. He turned left and continued walking.

As Trey stopped Yoh had finally had time to catch his breath. Gazing up Yoh couldn't even see past the giant's ankles much less his face. He thought about climbing onto the toenail but it was far too thick. He was essentially trapped just under the giant's toenail. Suddenly, Yoh felt the titan turn to the side and start walking. Unfortunately, Yoh didn't have any time to grab onto the skin and as the foot rose into the air, he was pressed down on his back. Then, when the foot came back down, he was launched into the air.
125121212.title: Like Bull Riding Only More Dangerous

1251212121.content:
Flying through the air, Yoh landed on something quite hard. Opening his eyes and looking around, Yoh found himself on the top of the big toe, past the expanse of toenail.

"Well," he thought. "That's one way to get up here."

Looking around Yoh decided what to do. He didn't have many options where he was.

Meanwhile Trey was walking around trying to find where he was.
"Man, Where am I? Where's the camp?" he thought, unaware he had the remains of the camp stuck to his foot's sole. He keeps walking in a direction hoping to see something he can recognize.

Far below on the ground, a group of bullies are picking on a nerdy kid. They push him over, and the biggest pins him down under his shoe.
Suddenly an earthquake hits. They're all thrown on to their backs, so they can do nothing but stare at the sight before them.
A titan so large they can't see past his ankles is striding into view. In a couple of steps he gets close, and suddenly his foot is hovering over them. For a fraction of a second the sky is dark as the foot blocks it. Then it comes crashing down as the giant walks on. The bullies and the nerd were crushed by the titan's foot step.
1251212121.title: On the foot

choices: Yoh runs into trouble at the ankle
Trey thinks he sees something on his foot...
12512121211.content:
No matter how Yoh tried to move, he couldn't keep his balance. Each time the massive foot moved, he was launched into the air, only to come back down on the toe. Each time the wind was knocked out of him, making this a painful journey. Finally, he found an effective way to move. Timing things just right, he jumped as the foot came down. By doing this he soared through the air and came down safely on the foot as it came back up. By doing this he managed to walk pretty far up the foot. After landing in the center of the foot, the titan stopped moving. Yoh took this opportunity to rest for awhile. Once he had his breath back he sprinted forward. He planned to take full advantage of this resting point.

Trey had stopped walking again. He was starting to get agitated. He'd been walking for awhile and he still had failed to find a recognizable landmark. He decided to stop walking for now and think up a new plan. Keeping his feet flat he sat down and leaned back, arms behind his head.

Yoh had been knocked onto his back as the titan decided to sit down. He couldn't even comprehend the mountainous body shifting in front of him. All he saw was flashes of blue and white. He couldn't tell what had been clothes or hair or skin. But he had stopped moving and now was as good a time as ever to make some progress.
12512121211.title: Titan Reclining

choices: Yoh comes up with a plan
125121212111.content:
While Trey was sitting, Yoh managed to make it to the massive ankel. However, found he was in trouble. There was no way he could climb it, it was a sheer vertical face.

Meanwhile, Trey didn't notice he was crushing a town underneath his butt as he sat there.

However the villagers did notice a titan teen sitting on them. Few survived, and some brave ones who did survive tried climbing the massive toe covering their town.
125121212111.title: Sitting

choices: Yoh succeeds in getting Trey's attention
Yoh fails in getting Trey's attention
1251212121111.content:
Trey felt a strange feeling on his big toe. It felt something was moving on it. He bent over and looked at it. He couldn't see anything but his toe felt funny. He scratched it and the feeling went away. Little did he know, he had just sent the remaining villagers falling to their doom. But this act had done something. Yoh had finally been able to make out the titan's face and he was shocked to see it was Trey. How could something like this happen?

Trey meanwhile, sat back and sighed in relief. That feeling had been starting to get on his nerves.

Yoh felt a little more comfortable knowing this huge giant was one of his best friends. At least he knew he wouldn't be intentionally crushed. But still until he got Trey's attention he was in trouble and unfortunately he was less than a speck to his friend. He might be able to get his attention with something like a big flash of light or something to that effect. He pulled out his sword and prepared to try and make something that Trey would be able to see.
1251212121111.title: Titan Revealed

12512121211112.content:
Yoh let his power build up, and then unleashed a massive burst of energy in the form of heat and light against the foot. He flashed the light on and off, as he knew flashing lights gained more attention than a standard light (hence Lighthouses flash).

Trey noticed the flashing down at his ankle. "Wow" he thought. "A firefly here?"

He laughed, the tiny size of the bug made him feel powerful. Trey sat there, crushing the village and grinning as he twisted around and hovered his other foot over the tiny bug on his ankle.

"I'm like a god to it. I wonder what it would look like looking up to see my foot hovering over him. I'd bet it couldn't even see all of my foot at once, I'd be too huge."


Yoh watched in terror as suddenly the entire sky was dark. Trey's foot hovered overhead, covering an area so vast that from the tinie's point of view, the entire world was covered by it.

Yoh screamed as he realized that Trey hadn't recognized him, and was lowering his massive foot. The massive toe was getting closer, and Yoh could barely see most of the big toe.
12512121211112.title: Firefly

choices: Trey explores the now tiny world, causing chaos wherever he goes
125121212111122.content:
As Trey was about to uknowingly crush his best friend, Yoh was looking around for anything he could do to save himself. In his panic his shaman powers started channeling in nearby spirits. His body glowed and he began to grow. In his desperation he managed to pull in quite a few spirits and his body grew larger and larger. He stopped when he was a little less than half an inch tall in comparison to Trey making him a huge giant to normal sized people and only slightly more noticeable than a bug to Trey. Trey had moved his foot away after he felt a strange heat coming from the bug on his foot. His mouth fell open as he recognized his friend.

"Yoh...is that you?" he asked in disbelief.

Yoh sighed in relief as Trey finally recognized him. Trey lowerd his hand Yoh jumped into it.

"Dude, what happened to you? You're so small!"

"No I'm not! You're just really, really, really huge!"

"No way!" Trey said in disbelief. "I think I'd know if I was huge."

Though it did sort of make sense. He had felt like he'd been wandering around a wasteland. If he really was a super huge giant then everything would've just looked like grass, moss, roots, and bugs. He bent over and looked as hard as he could at the ground. He was surprised to see a tiny pile of rubble: all that remained of the village he had sat on.

"Wow! I really am a giant!"

Trey grinned and stood up. This was great! He had unlimited power at his disposal! No one could stop him! He dropped Yoh on top of his headband and said, "You'll be safe up there little guy!"
125121212111122.title: Truth Revealed

1251212121111221.content:
Trey was now extremely curious. He was sitting on a village, how could he not be curious.

"Shall we go somewhere?" he asked Yoh. Not waiting for an answer, Trey stood up. This time he was aware of what he was doing, and he grinned as he imagined what he looked liked from a normal person's perspective.

"Hey, shall we go somewhere to talk for a moment?" Trey asked. "I need to get this worked out in my head".

Not waiting for an answer again, Trey strode over to mountains, which were slightly taller than he was. Sitting down he lent against one and picked Yoh up in his hand.


"This is so cool" Trey exclaimed. "How big do you think I am?" he asked Yoh.

Yoh's voice was barely a squeak to him, but it was loud enough to have a conversation with the giant.

"I don't know" Yoh shouted.

Trey picked up the tiny Yoh and measured him against his big toe.

"Wow, you're smaller than my big toe!" Trey exclaimed.

"Yeah, and I'm gigantic compared to a normal person. To a normal person... well they're too small for you to see. God, you can crush a village with your foot. I just hope you don't grow anymore" Yoh replied.

"Grow some more... hmm..." Trey pondered.
1251212121111221.title: Explanation

choices: Yoh falls down Trey's shirt and catches himself on his belly button
Yoh falls all the way down to Trey's feet
12512121211112211.content:
Trey picked Yoh back up and brought him to his face. He was about to say someting when a sudden pain cramped his body. He bent over and Yoh yelled out, "What's wrong?"

"I don't know!" Trey said. "My body hurts!"

The pains passed and Trey slowly stood up straight again. Before either of the boys could do anything, Trey began to grow again! He was awake and aware to see it this time and he laughed as he saw everything shrinking around him. The mountain that was just a little taller than him fell below his waist, then his knees, his ankles, his toes until they were like a mound of dirt! Trey looked down at his hand and discovered he couldn't see Yoh! He had grown so much that Yoh had shrunk from his sight again! He shrugged and pulled his collar out. He tipped the hand that had Yoh on it and held it there for a few minutes. There was nothing he could about not being able to see Yoh so he would probably be safe as long as he was on Trey's body. He had managed to survive this long after all.

Trey, grinning, turned his attention to the tiny world before him.
12512121211112211.title: Trey's a Growing Boy

125121212111122112.content:
Yoh watched in horror as Trey expanded in bursts. He watched as the gigantic face grew too large to be seen. The massive palm expanded until it was over 4 miles wide. Yoh couldn't even see the edge of the hand.

Suddenly he was thrown to the hand as it raised miles in the air. Looking up the sky was dark as he could see the ominous shadow of the gigantic head miles above him.

Suddenly the hand tipped and Yoh fell down the massive shirt. He hit the chest and started sliding down the rocky road. Past the gigantic pecs and down the massively large abs.

Yoh slid the miles down Trey's gigantic body until he reached the gigantic feet. Unfortunately he was unconscious by that time, having fallen nearly 100 miles.

-*-*-*-*-*-

Trey looked around. He worked out from the size of the mountains, which his toes were dwarfing, that he was over 114 miles tall. Each foot was 18 miles long. His big toe along was over 3 miles long.

The villages and cities in the area were all compacted underneath his soles. The power he held made him grin.
125121212111122112.title: A long fall

choices: Yoh wakes up and tries to stop Trey
1251212121111221121.content:
Trey cracked his knuckles and grinned down at this tiny world. There was a lot of injustice in this world and he intended to punish everyone for it. Before setting out he ground his feet into the ground to make sure the villages that were under them were quite smashed. He then started to move. The feeling of power was intoxicating. He knew that all the tiny people on the ground would look up and see nothing but a massive foot lowering on top of them. They'd barely have time to register they were going to die before they were crushed. Trey ground his foot into the ground with every step. Being so huge he didn't know if he was stepping on villages or not so he was careful to not let anything escape.

After about ten minutes of this, in which Trey caused chaos and destruction on a level no one thought possible, Trey turned around and crossed his arms. He smiled as he saw the set of footprints trailing away into the distance. He was making good time but this was taking too long. He turned back around and ran. Now not only was he crushing anything that moved, but those lucky enough to avoid the giant stomps were killed by the massive earthquakes caused by every foot fall.
1251212121111221121.title: Destruction Begins

12512121211112211211.content:
"Trey!! Trey!!" Trey heard a faint voice calling his name. He turned around and saw it was Yoh waving his arms and shouting up at him. He crouched down so he could see him better, "Whats up?" Trey said grinning.

"Trey you need to stop, you're hurting people! This isn't like you! Whatever has made you grow so big must be screwing with your head!" Yoh shouted up to him.

Trey frowned, "What do you mean screwing with my head? I am in perfect control of what I'm doing!"

"Thats not true and you know it! Look at what you've done to this village! You've demolished it and who knows how many people you've killed! Please Trey....stop doing this!" Yoh pleaded with him.

Trey stood up and looked around him. He surveyed his surroundings. He saw the damage he'd caused, he'd completely demolished the village and crushed countless people, for no reason at all.

"W...What have I done...?"
12512121211112211211.title: Yoh's Plea

choices: Trey ascends - Which means more growth
12512121211112211212.content:
Trey continued to crush the planet beneath his massive feet while Yoh watched on in part terror, part lust. There was something extremely hot about his best friend's power.

The power that he held was ego-boosting. Trey couldn't help but feeling powerful as he ground several cities with each footstep.

"No one can match my power" he thought to himself. "There is not entity more powerful than me. I bet even Zeke is a bug next to me. I'm god".

By all accounts, he was god. Already over the world people were creating religions based around him. How could they not? Here was a god that could not be denied. His existence couldn't be debated. He was there, and he was all powerful.


As unbelievable as everything was, Trey was beginning to ascend.
12512121211112211212.title: Ascention

choices: He destroys it and goes on to pass judgement on the rest of the galaxy
He protects it and collects other planets to protect
